name: Tower defense study
description:
Left click - Select tower, Place tower.

All Hot keys are displayed on the screen.

Enemies will avoid the tower.

You can't block the path of the enemy.

When the enemy reaches the exit, your HP will be reduced.

The game is over when HP is lost.
